requirement.topic: XmlBlaster does not route identical messages in Publish/Subcribe mode
requirement.description: Using the QOS flag <forceUpdate/> allows to force a published message to be sent to his subscribers, even when the content and the key meta data didn't change from the former message. Default is that identical published messages aren't sent to subscribers again.
requirement.example: <qos> <forceUpdate/> <!-- An update is forced even when the content and meta data didn't change --> <!-- Default is that identical published messages aren't sent to clients again --> </qos>
requirement.author: ruff@swand.lake.de
